attr.name: balance
attr.description: This attribute defines a number between -10,000 and +10,000 that determines how the volume will be divided between the speakers.

attr.name: loop
attr.description: This attribute indicates the number of times a sound is to be played and either has a numeric value or the keyword infinite.

attr.name: src
attr.description: This attribute specifies the URL of the sound file to be played, which must be one of the following types: .wav, .au, or .mid.

attr.name: volume
attr.description: This attribute defines a number between -10,000 and 0 that determines the loudness of a page's background sound.
